page.title: 02 NENE COLLEGE
page.content: Situated N.W. of town centre,on the Boughton Green Road. Park Campus is the main college site. Principal:R. Barden. 124 full-time tutors;968 full-time and 4515 part-time students. There are six departments:Engineering, Food, Fashion, Business and Profesional studies,General studies, Adult Education and Vocational preparation. Courses include catering,social care,hairdressing, City and Guild,GCE,BEC, YTS,CPVE and TVEI. Among the facilities are a licenced training restaurant,practical areas, science and language laboratories and two engineering workshops. The other college site is Nene College of Art situated by the old racecourse.
